0.post_text:
Artists from The Workroom are ready to turn your tumbler into works of art.

Mark these dates: 1 Apr at Starbucks Suntec Convention Centre, #02-393 and 2 Apr at Starbucks The Cathay, #01-05 from 10am on both days.

Simply purchase your tumbler at $19.90 (using your Starbucks Card) on the day, at participating stores to have it customized. Tumbler also comes with one Siren Starbucks Card ($0 value). Limited to 1 tumbler cuztomization per customer.

2.post_text: Join us for Earth Hour tomorrow (25 Mar), from 8:30pm - 9:30 pm. Bring your own mug or tumbler and we'll fill it with freshly brewed coffee. Valid at all Starbucks Singapore stores, on a tall-sized freshly brewed coffee. #EarthHour

3.post_text:
"My daughter is a radio DJ and is currently at a photoshoot. She always liked radio and I support her in any way I can. I brought her some extra clothes today as she needs to change outfits. I always tune in to her shows and I'm proud every time she's on air. I just hope she's happy with what she does."

Celebrating 20 years in Singapore, hear real stories from the Starbucks community. Tag your Starbucks story with @starbuckssg on Instagram.

4.post_text:
Sip some coffee, make some art. 
A blank tumbler is here, all ready for your creative touch. 

Purchase this 16oz Create-Your-Own tumbler at $19.90 using your Starbucks Card and receive a limited edition Siren Starbucks Card (with $0 value). Valid while stocks last, not available for sale separately.

7.post_text:
“I’m from my school’s adventure club. We organized an expedition to Nepal over some coffee sessions.The trip was fantastic, the view outside of your window looks like a wallpaper. The 4 day expedition was tough – sleeping on thin mattresses, climbing steep circuits with heavy equipment. You form strong bonds with those you trekked with. I still keep in contact with them and I won’t forget this trip.”

Celebrating 20 years in Singapore, hear real stories from the Starbucks community. Tag your Starbucks story with @starbuckssg on Instagram.

13.post_text:
“I send a lot of postcards. While having coffee today, I wrote a postcard for this German girl whom I met in Iceland. I write postcards because people forget about emails after a few days, but with something written by hand… people remember physical things. When you pick up the postcard again, it brings back memories.”

Celebrating 20 years in Singapore, hear real stories from the Starbucks community. Tag your Starbucks story with @starbuckssg on Instagram.

15.post_text:
“Most of our dates were at Starbucks because she liked coming here. Now that we are engaged, our dates revolve around our wedding plans. Coming to an agreement is one difficulty we always face. Like, she wants more bling on our wedding outfits, but I want it simple. We’re still finding that middle ground.” – Mubaraq and Nisa

Celebrating 20 years in Singapore, hear real stories from the Starbucks community. Tag your Starbucks story with @starbuckssg on Instagram.

17.post_text:
Round and round we go, on the coffee-go-round.

Spot the carriage with two of our cups, take a screen grab of it and show it to our baristas in stores for a one-for-one treat. Valid from 27 Feb - 3 Mar, on all handcrafted drinks, all sizes. Limited to 2 redemptions per transaction. T&Cs apply.

24.post_text:
The coffee-go-round: where bearistas have endless coffee and pandas show-off their smooth moves.

Spot the carriage with two of our cups, take a screen grab of it and flash it in stores for a one-for-one treat. Valid from 20-24 Feb, on all handcrafted drinks, all sizes. Limited to 2 redemptions per transaction. T&Cs apply.
